snippet: Nuance Communications, the leading company in voice technology, is expanding its efforts to make more kinds of machines responsive to our spoken commands.
abstract: Nuance Communications, the leading company in voice technology, is expanding its efforts to make more kinds of machines responsive to spoken commands; it is the speech-recognition engine for Siri, the virtual personal assistant on the Apple iPhone 4S; voice-recognition technology could rival innovations like the computer mouse and the icon and, some experts say, eventually pose challenges for giants like Google by bypassing their traditional search engines.
lead_paragraph: Nuance Communications, the leading company in voice technology, is expanding its efforts to make more kinds of machines responsive to our spoken commands.

headline.seo: Nuance Communications Wants a World of Voice Recognition
